r2dii.dataraw 0.0.2.9001
  • Reference
  • Changelog
  • r2dii

Datasets to bridge (translate) common sector-classification codes

Source: R/classification_bridge.R
classification_bridge.Rd

These datasets help to bridge (translate) common sector classification codes from the wild to codes we use in 2dii such as 'power', 'oil and gas', 'coal', 'automotive', 'aviation', 'concrete', 'steel', and 'shipping'.

isic_classification

nace_classification

naics_classification

Format

An object of class spec_tbl_df (inherits from tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) with 768 rows and 4 columns.

Value

A dplyr::tibble.

See also

data_dictionary().

Examples

isic_classification
#> # A tibble: 768 x 4
#>    code  code_level sector       borderline
#>    <chr>      <dbl> <chr>        <lgl>     
#>  1 A              1 not in scope FALSE     
#>  2 1              2 not in scope FALSE     
#>  3 11             3 not in scope FALSE     
#>  4 111            4 not in scope FALSE     
#>  5 112            4 not in scope FALSE     
#>  6 113            4 not in scope FALSE     
#>  7 114            4 not in scope FALSE     
#>  8 115            4 not in scope FALSE     
#>  9 116            4 not in scope FALSE     
#> 10 119            4 not in scope FALSE     
#> # … with 758 more rows
nace_classification
#> # A tibble: 929 x 5

#>  2          30.1  3011          4 shipping TRUE      
#>  3          30.1  3012          4 shipping TRUE      
#>  4          33.2  3315          4 shipping TRUE      
#>  5          50      50          2 shipping TRUE      
#>  6          50.1   501          4 shipping TRUE      
#>  7          NA    5010         NA shipping TRUE      
#>  8          50.2   502          4 shipping TRUE      
#>  9          NA    5020         NA shipping TRUE      
#> 10          52.2  5222          4 shipping TRUE      
#> # … with 919 more rows
naics_classification
